mapper.select: select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour from recent r, menu m where r.user_id=#{userId} and r.menu_id=m.menu_id order by r.recent_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into recent(recent_id, menu_id, user_id) values (recent_seq.nextval, #{menuId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from recent where user_id=#{userId}
